title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities               Outdoor Activities       Current schedules of ranger-guided programs Self-guiding trails folder  Individual trail folders:  Fort Hill and Red Maple Swamp Trail (Sections of the boardwalk at the Red Maple Swamp Trail have been closed due to structural deterioration and safety concerns. Check at Salt Pond Visitor Center for the current status of this trail, and for your safety, remain out of closed areas. A section of boardwalk is open at the trailhead at Fort Hill Road, off Route 6. The parking area is just past Fort Hill B&B and across from the Penniman House.) Nauset Marsh Trail Atlantic White Cedar Swamp Trail  Great Island Trail   Pamet Area Trail System  Small's Swamp Trail Beech Forest Trail  Cape Cod National Seashore Bicycle Trails Scenic Routes and Overlooks Look for our Cell Phone Interpretation Program signs and learn more about the locations you visit. Fort Hill Quest - a self-guided, GPS and compass scavenger hunt Horse Trail map
